channel.title: Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: 2.4.0 Pull #214 Avoid looping VAST Ad Pull #206 Fix tracking impression events for nonLinear ads Pull #221 Fix VAST loading issue by AdBlock Pull #207 Add support for HD icon on quality select Pull #209 Advanced theatre mode Pull #208 Compress files Pull #179 Fix to prevent changing speed during ads Pull #217 Prevent video size change on quality switch Pull #213 Controls to stay working with adblock and fix for double event on mobile touch Pull #212 Poster image to fit player size Pull #186 Fix for source switch on Edge Pull #219 Play / pause icon fix and progress bar to disappear correctly Pull #218 Optional theatre settings 2.
